title: Kiwi Care Package Company Recalls Wattie’s Canned Spaghetti With Sausage Products Distributed Without Benefit Of Import Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, Sept. 24, 2016 - Kiwi Care Package Company, a South Tahoe, Calif., establishment, is recalling approximately 90 pounds of Watties canned spaghetti with sausage that was not presented at the U.S. point of entry for inspection and was received from a New Zealand establishment...
